note: Retired. Former reference librarian, proofreader, graphic artist and food label compliance specialist. Avid reader, lifelong learner. Interested in science and computers. Believe that “The Truth is Out There” and we might find it through verified UAP sightings, paranormal experiences, or an encounter with the business end of a rock thrown by an angry Bigfoot. Write poetry and create handmade jewelry when I’m not busy being retired. Democratic Socialist. Sometime Buddhist. Animal lover.

name: Born April 22nd
value: Earth Day was first celebrated to commemorate this.

name: Boomer
value: Not the crabby, wrinkly, live in the 1960’s type.

name: Married
value: to the Unfrozen Caveman Guy from Milwaukee
